title: Green & White Patchwork Linen Shirt Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a women's shirt dress in alternating green and white patchwork panels, isolated on plain white background, high-detail linen texture, visible stitching, button placket, waist tie belt, short cuffed sleeves, collared neckline, mid-calf length, commercial-ready apparel presentation
style_fit: relaxed fit with adjustable waist tie
techpack: A-line shirt dress constructed from alternating green and white linen panels in patchwork layout. Features short cuffed sleeves, classic shirt collar, button front placket, self-fabric waist tie belt, and patch pockets. Contrast stitching highlights panel seams. Mid-calf length hem with clean finish.
provenance: Designed by combining trending green and white color palette with patchwork inspiration from provided examples.
design_text:
Green & White Patchwork Linen Shirt Dress (GW001)
Colors: forest green, white
Fabrics: 100% linen
Prints/Patterns: patchwork blocks
Garment Type: shirt dress
Silhouette: A-line
Sleeves: short cuffed sleeves
Neckline: classic shirt collar
Length: mid-calf
Style / Fit: r, e, l, a, x, e, d,  , f, i, t,  , w, i, t, h,  , a, d, j, u, s, t, a, b, l, e,  , w, a, i, s, t,  , t, i, e
Trims & details: button front placket, self-fabric waist tie belt, patch pockets, contrast stitching
Techpack: available
